title: Evolution!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hmm~.... I wonder….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh, you don’t normally make such a troubled face. What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You! Perfect timing♪ What do you think is a good addition for a new version of the Stewshine? The Stewshine needs to evolve further. You’re good at cooking, right You? Help me think of something!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh? I don’t know what to say~.... What do you already have in mind?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Caviar, Foie Gras, Karasumi, and Abalone…. Maybe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>So strong! What flavor would that even be!? Well, I don’t know what Caviar or Karasumi taste like though…. How about we change the seasoning instead of changing the base ingredients?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I see…. If we want to incorporate the flavors then Soy Sauce, Miso, Mirin, Sake, Sesame, and Wasabi…. What else?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I don’t think you should put Soy Sauce and Miso together…. But, I guess the Japanese style might be a good idea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmm~.... Then, let’s turn it around! How about we soak it in a bran bed?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeh!? I thought we’re getting closer to the answer, but how did you even arrive at that conclusion!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
